Straight Shot felt hear heart pour out even for Elita, who could possibly l=
ose her father and the thought of losing a loved one, ached her heart as mu=
ch as it ached Elitas.  But she knew that she had to be a role model, and k=
new in her own heart, that Tucson wouldn't take no for an answer and he was=
 going to bring Rodimus back, no matter what was thrown in front of him.  S=
he goes over to Elita, as Rat Trap follows her, wanting to help her out as =
well.  For a moment, they hold hands as they both smile into each other's e=
yes.

Straight Shot then goes to Elita, and puts a gentile hand on her shou=
lder. 

" On Earth, there's this popular term known as "The Knight in Shini=
ng Armor."  Who would ride into the occasion and smite evil demons when the=
y threatened to cast darkness and dispair on the innocent.  Even though he =
doesn't ride a horse with fancy armor, and carry a lance and a shield, Tucs=
on is one of those Knights.  He won't give up until the dragon or in this c=
ase, the insect is slayed and Rodimus brought safely back to consciousness.=
  He will win this battle for Rodimus, I know he will."

Rat Trap thinks fo=
r a moment.

"Ya know, she's got a point Elita, everything Wheels did up ti=
ll now, and everything he actually succeeded in doing, that took real coura=
ge and determination and in those days, on Earth, that's what medevil knigh=
ts are made of. So yeah, he's definitely one of them, a Knight in shining s=
ilver armor and when the lights strike against his paint job, he'll blind t=
he eyes of those who aren't used to such light.  Your dad'll be saved, I kn=
ow he will.  Wheels ain't gonna leave a fight unfaught."

Night Shift walks=
 over to them.

"Bet your rear bumpers he's not.  He's gonna kick bug aft b=
ig time, and when he does, he ain't gonna stop there, he's gonna fight hard=
 until there's some sorta sense of peace on this planet. It's who he is and=
 what he does.  And it's that drive that earned him his name in the first p=
lace.  Eventually the Decepticons, Predacons and Unicronians are gonna defi=
nitely know who he is and what he's capable of doing.  Any decendent of Opt=
imus Prime is gonna be sure the job gets done."

That gets a few heads to t=
urn, as Quickstride, Rat Trap and Straight Shot look at him.

" What'dya sa=
y?  No way, really?"

As Quickstride scratches behind an ear. Straight Shot=
 and Rat Trap gawk.

" Wha?  Ya mean all this time I fought with Tucson in =
the past, and all along, come ta find out he's related ta Optimus Prime? Wo=
w...  I - had no idea..  No wonder why he's got so much courage and determi=
nation and selflessness. "

Rat Trap chimes in.

" Well, that sure explains=
 a lot.  I knew there was somethn' familliar about 'em, but I couldn't put =
my finger on it till Nightshift said somethn'.  Yeah, it makes sense, his a=
lt form, a large truck with a large trailer, he's just as tall, body featur=
es almost like Optimus Prime's..  Slightly different but nearly the same.. =
And his voice, the patterns are almost like the big guy's..  But still I ne=
ver really put that together until now."

Night Shift nodds.

" Tucson does=
n't know that I know about it.  I just so happened ta look up somethn' in h=
is file one day, when he asked me ta look over it for 'em and there it was.=
  Same molds used ta build Optimus.  Of course a lotta things were changed =
over the years, and Tucson came out different, color sceme and all, but he'=
s definitely got Optimus Prime's attributes and physical strength.  Well, t=
hat came after he got the power of the Matrix..  But he sure had the back b=
one when he was just his normal self.  And Elita, you can count on him ta d=
eliver, and that's exactly what he's gonna do."

They all now gather around=
 Elita to offer their reassurance.
